description.p: Ibus-table is an input method framework for table-based input methods. Mostly it is used for Chinese input methods such as ZhengMa, WuBi, ErBi, CangJie, …. But some tables for other languages are available as well.
This new stable release includes these changes:

issues.issue: Add GUI test
Make output of ibus-table-createdb deterministic
Update translations from Weblate (updated fr, tr, zh_CN)

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

issues.issue: rhbz#835376: Add suggestion mode feature
github-pull#9: Add suggestion mode feature
Add test cases for suggestion mode feature
Fix problems with the behaviour of the property menus
Use python logging module with log file rotation instead of writing to stdout/stderr
Update translations from Weblate (updated de, es, fr, pt_BR, pt_PT, tr, uk)

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

issues.issue: github-mike-fabian-issue#26: Fix crash when changing some options using the menu or the floating panel
Translation updates (pt_PT)

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

issues.issue: Fixed two typos in message ids (Thanks to Rafael Fontenelle)
Translation updates (tr, fr, fa, pt, uk)
New test cases for ibus-table-others

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

issues.issue: rhbz#1786652: Add exist_ok=True in os.makedirs(path, exist_ok=True) to avoid failure due to race condition.
Move MockEngine classes into a separate file and make test_itb.py runnable standalone
Add new test case for ibus-table-others-1.3.10 (latex table additions)
Translation updates for several languages (French at 100% now, Brazilian Portuguese at 100% now, Porguguese (Portugal) new and now at 31.5%)

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

issues.issue: Added Turkish translation from Weblate, 100% translated
Minor translation updates some other languages (Punctuation fixes).

description.p: The Anthy input method is designed for entering Japanese text.
Input methods are typing systems allowing users to input complex languages. They are necessary because these contain too many characters to simply be laid out on a traditional keyboard.
El mètode d'entrada Anthy està dissenyat per a l'entrada de text en japonès.

Els mètodes d'entrada són sistemes mecanogràfics que permeten als usuaris l'entrada d'idiomes complexos. Són necessaris perquè aquests idiomes contenen massa caràcters per col·locar-los simplement en un teclat tradicional.
El método de entrada Anthy está diseñado para usarlo con texto japonés.

Los métodos de entrada son sistemas que facilitan el uso de idiomas complejos. Son necesarios porque estos idiomas tienen demasiados caracteres como para ponerlos de forma sencilla en un teclado tradicional.
La méthode de saisie Anthy est conçue pour saisir des textes en japonais.

Les méthodes de saisie sont des systèmes permettant aux utilisateurs de saisir des langues complexes. Elles sont nécessaires parce que les trop nombreux caractères de ces langues ne peuvent être disposés sur des claviers classiques.
Anthy 入力方式は日本語のテキストを入力するために設計されています。
入力方式はユーザーに複雑な言語入力を可能にさせる文字入力システムです。 入力方式は従来のキーボード上で簡単に割り当てられた多くの文字を含んでいるために必要とされています。
Спосіб введення Anthy розроблено для введення текстів японськими ієрогліфами.

Способи введення — це системи набирання тексту, за допомогою яких користувачі можуть вводити тексти складними системами писемності. Вони потрібні для мов, де запис здійснюється за допомогою великої кількості символів, які просто не могли б уміститися на клавіатурі.

component.name: Pinyin
component.summary: Chinese Pinyin and Zhuyin input method

description.p: The Pinyin input method is designed for entering Chinese text by using Pinyin or Zhuyin.
Input methods are typing systems allowing users to input complex languages. They are necessary because these contain too many characters to simply be laid out on a traditional keyboard.
This multilingualization input method allows entering many languages using the input methods from the m17n library.
This new stable release includes these changes:
This new stable release includes these changes:

ul.li: New translations: tr (Turkish) 100%, uk (Ukrainian) 100%, id (Indonesian) 100%, ja_JP (Japanese) 100%.

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

ul.li: Fix for google code issue 1781 in ibus-m17n for kk (Correct symbols for kk input methods)

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

ul.li: Migrate from IBusConfig to GSettings. Resolves: https://github.com/ibus/ibus-m17n/issues/3
Add an option to emulate US layout
Fix preedit background colour and underlining
Switch off preedit background and foreground correctly if disabled in the setup tool

description.p: IBus-Hangul is a Korean input method engine for IBus.
